resources.string:
Change currency

Original amount: %1$s 
From: %2$s 
 To: %3$s 

 Convert result: %4$.2f

This application is an application that changes the currency value for the destination country you want to change, this application asks for the amount of money that you want to change, after that it asks for two dropdown inputs for the currency you want to change to the desired currency. This application does not use an API so currency values cannot change according to the original value and can only change in five countries.
